abilitygroupdescription.p: Shield abilities refer to any combat training with a shield or buckler.

abilitydescription.p: ability:block When a character is attacked they may attempt to block the blow using their shield instead of making an armour roll. This ability spends the characters reaction for the round. If the block result fails and a boon is rolled the attack deals half damage. If the block result fails and a bane is rolled the attack deals double damage. If the block check succeeds the attack does no damage. If the block succeeds and a boon is rolled the blocker smashes the attacker in the face with the shield for 2 damage.

Shield Push The character can use the shield to push an adjacent opponent back in a direction chosen by the character. The opponent must be corporeal, humanoind, capable of being moved, and not too much larger than the character.

support Large shields provide Support. The character wielding a large shield can use their reaction to block attacks on adjacent allies. In order to use this ability the ally must be standing shoulder to shoulder with the character. In other respects this ability works like Shield Block.
